name: Duck Duck Revolution (GH0ST8)
description:
You Live in a small village in the forest. The Village is normally peaceful, but lately, there have been rumors of monsters appearing nearby. Will you leave the safety of the town and journey out into the world? Only you can make that decision

Sprites were either made by me or came from the GB Standard Pack as well as the 2-Bit Generator for some of the villagers

Backgrounds Came From Kennys Monochrom RPG Pack And MonkeyImage's Tileset

All Music Except for the Town Music was also done by me, The Town Music is a default from GB Studio
